All the obvious frontline names have all the usual pluses and minuses, Mr. Bauer says. But in considering one candidate, Mr. Bauer sees only qualities that he likes. unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. Startup Virtual Iron has a maturing virtual server technology that is making inroads with customers and providing a challenge to VMWare. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. That comment from Jamie Buehrle carries a direct line to Michael Vick , who was presented with the NFL's Comeback Player of the Year Award this past weekend.
